text.speaker: narrator
text.message: Following the path up to the mountain summit, you arrive at the dragon's den.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: You push open the grand doors to the treasure room only to find...

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: The room was empty save for an injured red dragon and a couple of rusty swords and armour.

text.speaker: Friend
text.message: What in the world happened here?

text.speaker: Dragon
text.message: Somebody snuck in and stabbed me with a poisoned dagger while I was sleeping!!

text.speaker: Dragon
text.message: They even took all my gold and my life's greatest treasure!

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: The dragon bursts into tears, looking like he's had the shittest day of his life

text.speaker: Friend
text.message: Do you know which way that person left?

text.speaker: Dragon
text.message: Out that oak door, and on the left. They haven't left for long.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: The dragon bursts into tears again, and your two friends comfort him. You grab a rusty sword and chase after the traitor.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: You catch up to them pretty fast, and chuck a pokeball at their head
